testcase.name: A user forgot their username and wants an email sent to remind them
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: A user forgot their username and wants an email sent to remind them Given The user is on the Login Page ... passed in 0.102s Given The user clicks on Forgot username? ... passed in 0.104s When The user inputs their first name and last name ... passed in 0.034s And The user clicks the Resend username button ... passed in 2.487s Then The user is redirected to a page telling them the username email was sent ... passed in 2.049s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: A user forgot their username and wants an email sent to reset it
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: A user forgot their username and wants an email sent to reset it Given The user is on the Login Page ... passed in 0.108s Given The user clicks on Forgot password? ... passed in 0.114s When The user inputs their username ... passed in 0.020s And The user clicks the Reset password button ... passed in 0.555s And The user enters the OTP ... passed in 0.048s And The user clicks the Authenticate User button ... passed in 1.208s Then The user is redirected to a page telling them the password email was sent ... passed in 1.915s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: A logged in user wants to reset their password
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: A logged in user wants to reset their password Given The user is on the Login Page ... passed in 0.106s Given The user logs in ... passed in 1.779s And The user clicks on Settings ... passed in 0.504s When The user clicks on the Send email link ... passed in 1.761s Then The user is redirected to a page telling them the password email was sent again ... passed in 0.028s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
